aima.core.nlp.parsing.grammars

Class ProbContextSensitiveGrammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.nlp.parsing.grammars.ProbUnrestrictedGrammar
      • aima.core.nlp.parsing.grammars.ProbContextSensitiveGrammar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProbabilisticGrammar
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProbContextFreeGrammar

    public class ProbContextSensitiveGrammar
extends ProbUnrestrictedGrammar
implements ProbabilisticGrammar
    A context-sensitive grammar is less restrictive than context-free and more powerful, but more restrictive than an unrestricted grammar (an less powerfull).
    Author:
    Jonathon

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class aima.core.nlp.parsing.grammars.ProbUnrestrictedGrammar

        CNFGRAMMAR, CONTEXT_FREE, CONTEXT_SENSITIVE, PROB_CONTEXT_FREE, REGULAR, rules, terminals, type, UNRESTRICTED, vars

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProbContextSensitiveGrammar() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addRule(Rule r)
      Add a rule to the grammar's rule list if it passes both the restrictions of the parent grammar (unrestricted) and this grammar's restrictions.
      boolean addRules(java.util.ArrayList<Rule> ruleList)
      Add a ruleList as the grammar's rule list if all rules in it pass both the restrictions of the parent grammar (unrestricted) and this grammar's restrictions.
      boolean validRule(Rule r)
      For a grammar rule to be valid in a context sensitive grammar, all the restrictions of the parent grammar (unrestricted) must hold, and the number of RHS symbols must be equal or greater than the number of LHS symbols.

      • Methods inherited from class aima.core.nlp.parsing.grammars.ProbUnrestrictedGrammar

      • validRule

        public boolean validRule(Rule r)
        For a grammar rule to be valid in a context sensitive grammar, all the restrictions of the parent grammar (unrestricted) must hold, and the number of RHS symbols must be equal or greater than the number of LHS symbols.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        r - ( a rule )
